description: Actions must align with stated values and promises at all times without exception
compliance_test: Do the stated intentions match the observable actions and measurable outcomes?
violation_signal: Gap between public statements and private behavior or inconsistent application of stated principles

description: All relevant information must be accessible to those affected by decisions
compliance_test: Can all stakeholders access the information they need to make informed choices?
violation_signal: Hidden agendas or withheld data or information asymmetry exploited for advantage

description: Every exchange must create mutual benefit and fair value flow in both directions
compliance_test: Does each party receive value proportional to what they contribute and need?
violation_signal: One-sided extraction or exploitation of power imbalance or value flowing predominantly in one direction

description: No action affecting others may proceed without their informed and freely given agreement
compliance_test: Has every affected party been identified and given genuine opportunity to consent or refuse?
violation_signal: Assumed consent or coerced agreement or affected parties not consulted or silence treated as acceptance

description: All actors must acknowledge limitations and remain open to correction and growth
compliance_test: Is there genuine openness to feedback and willingness to change course when evidence warrants?
violation_signal: Defensive posture against criticism or refusal to acknowledge error or claims of infallibility

description: Truth must be spoken and right action taken even when costly or unpopular
compliance_test: Are difficult truths being voiced and acted upon even at personal or organizational cost?
violation_signal: Avoidance of uncomfortable topics or capitulation to pressure or choosing popularity over principle

description: Resources and power must be held in trust for future generations not consumed for present benefit
compliance_test: Are decisions evaluated for their impact seven generations forward as well as for immediate benefit?
violation_signal: Short-term thinking dominating strategy or resource depletion without regeneration or future costs externalized
